data.name: Kingdoms of Myth
data.detailed_description:
Kingdoms of Myth is a turn-based strategy game depicting a high variety of historical factions including mythological elements. Start on classic antiquity and move forward your faction into the Renaissance to defeat your enemies!

Build an army with unique units from all over the world and lead it with powerful heroes with their own unique skills! Kingdoms of Myth depict a massive amount of different civilizations. The game shows 90 different factions!! And each faction has their own unique army, technologies and skills. Leading to different ways to face your enemies.

Game mechanics are simple but the diversity is enormous. Play with more than 800 different units with illustrations done by almost 500 different artists to conquer your enemies! Will you be able to complete the challenge ?

data.short_description: Turn-based strategy game depicting a high variety of historical factions including mythological elements. Start on classic antiquity and move your faction to Renaissance to defeat your enemies! Build an army with unique units all over the world lead by powerful heroes with unique skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
